projects.name: Portfolio
description: The idea of this portfolio was to create a showcase of the projects I've worked on in the past few years at different companies and for different clients. I tried to keep it as simple as possible

projects.name: Headcount
description: In this project i acted as a part of a small Scrum team, co-responsible for the construction of the dashboard for the HR department of Brightwave. The number of employees and associated information are stored and processed. The data then had to be translated into different graphs.

projects.name: Ship Rating
description: At Teqplay I have developed a system for the Port of Rotterdam Authority where shippers within the port are motivated to comply with the rules and procedures. I was responsible for researching how the problem could be solved within an application. From this came that a mobile app would be the most desirable.
The mobile app I have developed, among other things, using Gamification, Ionic, Angular / TypeScript and Firebase.

projects.name: S.C. Website
description: Website created for Spil Creative, the template has been created from scratch and then implemented in Wordpress.

projects.name: The Fashion Picture Dictionary
description: For The Fashion Professor I developed a mobile application for both Android and IOS. This app, called The Fashion Picture Dictionary, is an extensive visual collection of silhouettes and details for clothing.

projects.name: The Fashion Professor
description: Website redesigned for The Fashion Professor, the template has been created from scratch and then implemented in Wordpress

projects.name: Fapadab
description: Website created for Fapadab, its a non-responsive website developed from scratch and then implemented in Wordpress.
